reasoning_log: The matching process involved categorizing images into Living/Dining (L/D), Kitchen (K), Bedroom (B), and Bathroom (Ba) groups. Ambiguities within the L/D and B categories were resolved using specific visual cues mentioned in the tags. For L/D, Image_1 was chosen for the '開放式格局' (open layout) showing the kitchen connection, while Image_11 was chosen for '客餐分區明確' (clear separation) due to the prominent decorative feature wall. For Bedrooms, Image_5 was uniquely identified by the built-in desk area, Image_10 by the large sliding wardrobe ('大容量衣櫃'), and Image_6 was assigned the lowest light rating ('採光一般') due to its smaller window size compared to Image_4. Kitchens were differentiated by the presence and perspective of the bar counter (Image_13 vs. Image_14) and the standard galley layout with a back door (Image_3). Bathrooms were easily separated by the unique patterned tile in Image_7 versus the minimalist design in Image_8. All 14 descriptions were matched 1:1 to the 14 images.

matching_result_list.evidence: Open layout (開放式格局) showing the seamless connection between the living area, dining area, and the entrance to the kitchen/utility space.
Living/Dining area connected to a large sliding door/balcony (連接陽台), providing good natural light and flow.
Complete galley kitchen configuration with a door at the end, confirming '後陽台連結' (connected to the back balcony) and '完整廚房配置'.
Empty, spacious bedroom ('空間寬敞') with a full-height sliding door/window, suggesting moderate light/ventilation ('採光通風尚可').
Features a large corner window and a built-in counter/shelf specifically designed as a '預留書桌工作區' (reserved desk/work area).
The remaining empty bedroom, featuring a smaller window compared to others, aligning with the '採光一般' (average lighting) tag.
Bathroom featuring a highly distinctive, decorative patterned tile band, differentiating it from the other bathroom.
Minimalist bathroom design with clear glass separation for the shower area ('乾濕可分離') and simple, clean lines ('動線簡潔').

tag_list: 通風同樣可能仰賴排風

matching_result_list.evidence: Furnished master bedroom ('主臥房') showing a large space, bed, and a dedicated dressing/vanity area.
Furnished master bedroom prominently featuring a massive, floor-to-ceiling built-in sliding wardrobe, matching '大容量衣櫃'.
Open space with a decorative wood slat wall and glass railing, creating a visually clear separation between the living and dining areas ('客餐分區明確').
The remaining L/D image, showing balcony access ('通往陽台') and a functional layout suitable for small family gatherings.
Semi-open kitchen view from the living area, clearly showing the bar counter ('廚房連吧台區') separating the tiled kitchen floor from the wood living floor.
View of the kitchen counter and storage area, confirming the spacious layout ('料理空間寬敞') and modern appliances ('廚具新穎').
